rawText:
<
  T extends { [key: string]: any },
  U extends { [key: string]: any }
>(
  childObject: ChildObject<T>,
  mapFunction: (item: ChildObject<T>) => U
): ChildObject<U> => {
  const newChildObject = mapFunction(childObject);

  return {
    ...newChildObject,
    children: childObject.children?.map((child) =>
      mapChildObjectRecursive(child, mapFunction)
    ),
  } as ChildObject<U>;
}
name: mapChildObjectRecursive
description: maps a ChildObject and all it's children, recursively
